Package models

Interface FlexibleStock

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlexibleStockImpl
    public interface FlexibleStock
    This interface represents the operations that can be performed on a single stock of a company in flexible portfolio.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      float getCostBasis​(java.time.LocalDate date, ApiType apiType)
      This method is used to get the cost basis of this stock.Cost Basis shows the total amount of money invested in a portfolio by a specific date.
      java.lang.StringBuilder getPlot​(java.time.LocalDate startDate, java.time.LocalDate endDate, ApiType apiType)
      This method tell the user how a particular stock has performed over a period of time using a line chart by taking date ranges in which he wants to see the performance.
      float getShares()
      This method gives the number of shares present in this stock.
      float getTransactionCost()
      This method gives transaction cost associated with this stock.
      float getValue​(java.time.LocalDate date, ApiType apiType)
      This method is used to get the total value of this stock on a certain date.

    • Method Detail

      • getPlot

        java.lang.StringBuilder getPlot​(java.time.LocalDate startDate,
                                java.time.LocalDate endDate,
                                ApiType apiType)
        This method tell the user how a particular stock has performed over a period of time using a line chart by taking date ranges in which he wants to see the performance.
        Parameters:
        startDate - LocalDate start date of the range.
        endDate - LocalDate end date of the range.
        apiType - ApiType used determine which third party api is to be called.
        Returns:
        plot showing the performance of the stock.

      • getValue

        float getValue​(java.time.LocalDate date,
               ApiType apiType)
        This method is used to get the total value of this stock on a certain date. If weekend values are given then it tells the user to enter a date which is not weekend.
        Parameters:
        date - String which is given by the user
        apiType - ApiType used determine which third party api is to be called.
        Returns:
        total value of the stock on a certain date.

      • getCostBasis

        float getCostBasis​(java.time.LocalDate date,
                   ApiType apiType)
        This method is used to get the cost basis of this stock.Cost Basis shows the total amount of money invested in a portfolio by a specific date.
        Parameters:
        date - String which is given by the user
        apiType - ApiType used determine which third party api is to be called.
        Returns:
        float which has the total amount of money invested in a stock by a specific date

      • getShares

        float getShares()
        This method gives the number of shares present in this stock.
        Returns:
        float number of shares present for this stock

      • getTransactionCost

        float getTransactionCost()
        This method gives transaction cost associated with this stock.
        Returns:
        float transaction cost
